actions.committee: Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Banking, Housing and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide for the disclosure of certain information relating to persons intending to file tender offers and for other purposes.

summary.text: Requires any person or firm to register with the Securities and Exchange Commission before issuing a tender offer under the Securities Exchange Act (presently foreign firms need not register). Provides that the making of a tender offer must be announced 60 days in advance.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 to provide for the disclosure of certain information relating to persons intending to file tender offers and for other purposes.
